comment.body: @Realjohndoe: If rights don't apply to everyone then they are not human rights. Therefore by deffinition homosexuals get human rights. I'll ignore the false associations in your post.
You might  want to use quotes so I know what you are saying vs quoting.
@Daniell Mesquita: because he doesn't have NSA clearance for that?
What I couldn't figure out at first was that one had to wait for the icon change before dragging it.
